thread.title: Think a Marathon Isn’t Challenging Enough? Try Doing It Backward

author: Gabriele Steinhauser
title: Think a Marathon Isn’t Challenging Enough? Try Doing It Backward
text:
JOHANNESBURG—Racing toward the finish line of yet another half-marathon, Farai Chinomwe briefly turned his head. The quick neck twist wasn’t to check whether anyone was hot on his heels. It was to check where the finish line was.
“This running forward is too old-fashioned,” says the 39-year-old Zimbabwean, who ran every step of the 21.1 kilometers backward.
Since...
